cluster.name: Occupancy Sensing
cluster.description: The server cluster provides an interface to occupancy sensing functionality, including configuration and provision of notifications of occupancy status.

history.description: Physical Contact Occupancy feature with mandatory OccupancySensorTypeBitmap
New data model format and notation
Remove nullable from PhysicalContact delay attributes and ability to not report transitions

bits.name: Occupied
bits.description: If this bit is set, it SHALL indicate the occupied state else if the bit if not set, it SHALL indicate the unoccupied state.

values.name: PIRAndUltrasonic
values.summary: Indicates a passive infrared and ultrasonic sensor.

attributes.name: Occupancy
attributes.description: This attribute indicates the sensed (processed) status of occupancy.

attributes.name: OccupancySensorType
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the type of the occupancy sensor.

attributes.name: OccupancySensorTypeBitmap
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the types of the occupancy sensor. Each bit position, if set, indicates the corresponding sensing capability is implemented.

attributes.name: PIROccupiedToUnoccupiedDelay
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the time delay, in seconds, before the PIR sensor changes to its unoccupied state after the last detection of movement in the sensed area.

attributes.name: PIRUnoccupiedToOccupiedDelay
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the time delay, in seconds, before the PIR sensor changes to its occupied state after the detection of movement in the sensed area.

attributes.name: PIRUnoccupiedToOccupiedThreshold
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the number of movement detection events that must occur in the period PIRUnoccupiedToOccupiedDelay, before the PIR sensor changes to its occupied state.

attributes.name: UltrasonicOccupiedToUnoccupiedDelay
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the time delay, in seconds, before the Ultrasonic sensor changes to its unoccupied state after the last detection of movement in the sensed area.

attributes.name: UltrasonicUnoccupiedToOccupiedDelay
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the time delay, in seconds, before the Ultrasonic sensor changes to its occupied state after the detection of movement in the sensed area.

attributes.name: UltrasonicUnoccupiedToOccupiedThreshold
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the number of movement detection events that must occur in the period UltrasonicUnoccupiedToOccupiedDelay, before the Ultrasonic sensor changes to its occupied state.

attributes.name: PhysicalContactOccupiedToUnoccupiedDelay
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the time delay, in seconds, before the physical contact occupancy sensor changes to its unoccupied state after detecting the unoccupied event.

attributes.name: PhysicalContactUnoccupiedToOccupiedDelay
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the time delay, in seconds, before the physical contact sensor changes to its occupied state after the detection of the occupied event.

attributes.name: PhysicalContactUnoccupiedToOccupiedThreshold
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the number of movement detection events that must occur in the period PhysicalContactUnoccupiedToOccupiedDelay, before the PhysicalContact sensor changes to its occupied state.
